summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2120 for the improvement of North and West Seventy-sixth Street, from Woodland Park Avenue to Eighth Avenue Northwest; North Seventy-seventh Street from Woodland Park Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; Dayton Avenue, from North Seventy-fifth Street to North Seventy-seventh Street, and Fremont Avenue, from North Seventy-fifth Street to North Seventy-eighth Street, all in The City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21214, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
